subject: Public Speaking
title: Return with the Elixir
description: One-minute skill: Return with the Elixir.

hook.text: The hero returns home with new wisdom to share. That's your speech.

buildup.text: You went through something. You learned. Now you're teaching.

discovery.text: The elixir is the insight audiences can apply to their own lives.

twist.text: Frame your speech as a gift from your journey to them.

climax.text: Great speeches say: I went there so you don't have to.

punchline.text: Share your wisdom. That's why you're speaking.

quiz.question: What is the elixir?
options: Wisdom from experience shared with others
